haru

"Calm, colorful color scheme"

haru is a warm color palette for dark theme imagined around the corner spring. It represents wide range of hue inspired by Monokai and One Dark for syntax highlighting readability, but also keeps friendly to eyes by picking pastel colors.

[GitHub]
